amendment.description: An amendment numbered 152 printed in House Report 115-297 to increase National Cancer Institute funding by $3,819,000, offset with a reduction to the Department of Health and Human Services Office of the Secretary account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A135) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A135) offered by Mr. Nolan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A135) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
